column1: length outside off, not much pace or carry, left alone
length outside off, hint of movement away, better carry as well, but left alone again
full on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg to get his innings going. Looks like an easy paced pitch so far
full on off, just a gentle push but impeccable timing teases the mid-off fielder all the way down to the boundary, who saves one with a slide, pick up and throw
length outside off, left alone
full on off, solid forward defence
length, angled in, pushed to mid-on for one
overpitched outside off, Guptill drives crisply but can't get it past cover
full outside off, pushed to mid-off
full on off, pushed to mid-off's right and they scamper a single
full and angling in, nearly trapped Munro in front as he shuffled across to work it to the leg side but saved by an inside edge
slower ball on middle, defended back to the bowler
full outside off, Murno pushes forward and gets a thick inside edge that trickles away towards mid-on
length, angled in, Guptill misses the flick and is struck on the thigh pad
full and angled in, Guptill flicks again, only gets an inside edge to short fine-leg this time
length outside off, rears disconcertingly on Munro, who plays it well, with his bottom hand coming off, to keep the ball down
length on middle, crisply pushed to mid-on
full outside off, Guptill lunges forward to drive but can't beat cover. Didn't come on to the bat, that one
length on the pads, clipped away to fine-leg

full on middle and Guptill goes through the line to launch it over the bowler's head for a massive six. Held his shape beautifully for the cameras as he completed that shot, which wasn't much more than an extension of a forward defence
length outside off, quicker from Mustafizur this time, punched to cover
full on middle, pushed to mid-on
length on middle, defended back
length outside off, bit of width and Guptill, with the form he is in pounces on it, as he rocks back and punches it through the covers

big appeal and given. Munro had been flirting with danger, shuffling across and trying to play through the leg side, this time it nipped back into him and given the relative lack of bounce, struck on the knee roll, caught plumb in front
full outside off, confident stride forward and defended to cover
length outside off, defended audaciously late, with soft hands
length outside off, trying to lure him into having a poke but the batsman does not oblige
length outside off, lets it go again
full on off, defended back to the bowler, who finishes a wicket maiden
length on the pads, pushed to mid-on's right for one
length outside off, too wide to tempt the batman, who lets it through to the keeper
short on middle, hardly any bounce and pulled flat and hard to the squareleg fence to get under way
overcompensates and pitches full outside off, driven crisply  but can't beat the cover field
length on middle, closes the face and defends towards squareleg
length outside off, pushed to cover
overpitched outside off, squirted away to third-man's right, and he puts in a timely dive to keep it to two
full on off, pushed to cover
length on middle, pushed to mid-on
length outside off, goes back and defends to cover
length outside off, hint of movement away, Nicholls shuffles across, has a tentative poke and is beaten
short and wide and swatted past point for four. Mashrafe just released the pressure there
length outside off, bit of width, Guptill throws his bat at it, slices it over point and down to third-man, who makes a meal of it, letting it through his legs, much to the chagrin of the captain
length and drifting in, clipped to midwicket
length outside off, defended to mid-off
short on middle and CRACK. Pulled hard and flat, in front of square for four
length on off, defended back to the bowler
length on middle, and Guptill just lifts it over the mid-on, who was too far up in the circle. Had he been at the edge, this would have gone down his throat, but instead, it goes over him for four
length on middle, tucked away to fine-leg's left for two
length outside off, pushed to cover. Mashrafe is quite animated out there, letting his fielders know exactly what he thinks of the lapses so far
length on off, hint of movement away, held up in the pitch as well, defended late
length on middle, Guptill picks it aerially towards fine-leg  but it doesn't carry and the fielder keeps it down to one
length on middle, Nicholls rocks back and turns it around to deep squareleg's right for two
full on off, Guptill hammers it straight to mid-off
full on middle, Guptill turns the face too soon and gets a leading edge that spoons up towards mid-off but lands safely
length on middle, Nicholls rocks back to pull again but is too early into the shot and gets an edge back onto his body
length on the pads, Nicholls misses the flick and is struck on the thigh pad
slower ball, full on off, defended with a dead bat
slower ball on off, defended back to the bowler
length on middle, defended back to the bowler
full on middle, Guptill lunges forward to drive, gets a thick inside edge to midwicket as he is early into the stroke
length outside off, punched to point
length on middle, pushed to midwicket's right for one
length outside off, pushed to mid-off
length outside off, and out comes the cut shot, delicately late, almost as though against a spinner, past point and into the boundary
length on middle, defended
full on off, hint of curve away and nearly a leading edge that carries to the bowler as Guptill looks to turn the face and plays too early
yorker outside off, bit of swing again, jams his bat down on it and they scamper a single
full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket

taken brilliantly at long-on and Guptill won't be the first from his country to get three hundreds in a bilateral series. It was full on off, Guptill picked him up down the ground, perhaps meant to go slightly straighter, but the fielder judged it beautifully, first taking it and then as he overbalanced, had the presence of mind to toss it up back into play and catch it again while he was in the air, before coming back into playing area
length on middle, clipped to squareleg
full outside off, defended to cover
full on off, defended to cover
full on middle, pushed to mid-on
length outside off, hint of away movement, Taylor chases it tentatively and is beaten
full outside off, punched to deep cover
length outside off, defended to point's right and they scamper a single
struck on the pad, too high and perhaps pitched outside leg as he missed the flick
full on middle, pushed back to the bowler
full on middle, bit of swing back in again, defended back to the bowler
length on the pads, turns the face too early and gets a leading edge to cover, all along the ground, however
length outside off, steered to third-man
length on the pads, clipped away to deep squareleg
full on middle, pushed to mid-on's right
length on the pads, tucked away between deep squareleg and fine leg for two
length on off, defended solidly back to the bowler
short and misdirected down the leg side, Nicholls just helps it along, using the pace, down to the fine-leg fence
full outside off, driven to deep point
length, wide outside off, pushed to deep cover
length, angled in, pushed to squareleg
full outside off, driven past cover for two
full on the pads, Taylor pushes it to midwicket, it was in the air briefly but nowhere close to carrying
length ball on off, and punched off the back foot to mid-on
length ball on off, and turning inwards. Nudged off his hips to the vacant square-leg region
full on middle, and he taps a defensive shot down the ground to long on for a walking single
full, just outside off and a bit of offbreak. Defended with soft hands
flatter, length on middle. Worked off the back foot to square leg. Fielder there this time
extra rip. Full just outside off, and the offbreak is defended off the front foot
length ball on middle, and he shuffles across to the off side to defend
full on off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Drilled to mid off
full on off, and angling away. Reaches for the shot, and drives to extra cover on this occasion
full just outside off, and Taylor prods forward to block. Ball rolls away to cover
back of a length this time. Lands just outside off, and Taylor covers his off stump well, before defending from near his chest
slower ball to end the over. Back of a length on middle, and Taylor's come forward to early. Mistimed towards the leg side
length ball on middle, and he goes deep inside his crease, before punching with the straight bat to the fielder at long-on
length ball on off, and Taylor takes a big stride forward to try and paddle this fine. Ball takes the top edge and hits him near the helmet
length ball on off, and skirted away off his waist to square leg
length ball outside off, and he quickly rocks back to slap a cut down to deep point
full on leg stump, and he clears his front leg, before steering a leg-side whip to deep midwicket. Tidy work from Rubel, who displays some footwork near the boundary
full on leg, and clipped to mid-on for a quick single. They call early and run through, and complete the single before the fielder can intercept
length delivery, and he rolls his fingers over the ball. Lands on middle, and gets to Nicholls near his chest. Blocked off the back foot
tidy again. Length ball on middle, and angling towards off. He shuffles across to his left and defends off the back foot
length ball on off, and this has been steered with the bat's open face to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
length ball just outside off, and Taylor walks down the ground before muscling a leg-side clip to midwicket. Fielder gets a hand to it, slowing the ball's pace, and saving a certain boundary
full toss, wide outside off, and he clobbers this past mid-on's right for four! Tries the yorker, but Taylor's step towards the bowler makes it a full toss. Bottom-hand does the rest thereafter
length ball just outside off, and he punches this off the back foot to midwicket
length ball on off, and turning away from Nicholls. Slapped to deep point for one
length ball on off, and Taylor prods forward before settling backwards. Defended
fuller, landing on off, and driven with the spin to longon for one
full just outside off, and he slogs towards the leg side. Drags a shot to mid-on's left, and they take off for a single. Could be close... but Rubel's too slow to get rid of the ball
nice try! Full on middle, and Taylor steps forward to play the paddle sweep. But Liton - the keeper - anticipates the shot and runs to his left to cover the region, and the ball hits his glove!
length ball, just outside off, and defended off the front foot to cover
back of a length just outside off, and some extra bounce means Taylor has to fend this from near his face
full on off, slower from Saifuddin. Taylor keeps his eyes on the ball till the last moment, and defends with soft hands
back of a length outside off, but the bounce is lower this time. Plays the late cut to third man
length ball on middle, and Nicholls is in two minds there. Thought he was shaping up to pull, but checks his shot eventually. Punched to mid-on
length ball angling across, and cut away from his body to deep point for a walking single

chance of a run out! But nope, and that's New Zealand's 100. Full ball on middle, that he can't steer away behind square. Ball rolls away to the leg side as the batsmen call for the single. Saifuddin runs towards the ball, dives forward and releases the ball early... but it's not a direct hit
full just outside off, and blocked with the bat's open face to cover
full just outside off, and he backs away to make some extra room. Hammers the drive past mid off's right to the man in the deep
full on off, and the ball dips in this time. Driven with the straight bat to mid-on
full on leg, and Nicholls makes room again. Splices a drive to cover
yorked! Lands at the base of leg stump, and he squirts a leg-side whip to midwicket
full on leg stump, and he opens his stance to drive down to long on. Comfortable single
length ball angling into his body, and clipped behind square to deep backward square. Quite comfortably done in the end
length ball on middle, and worked off his pads towards fine leg once again. Just the single this time around
goes short, but the ball doesn't bounce enough. Angling into Taylor, and he nudges this off his hips to deep backward square. Half-century stand between these two
length ball just outside off, and again angling into his body. Rides the bounce to block towards the leg side
full on leg stump, and nudged off his pads to deep backward square again. They jog the first one hard, and Taylor pushes his partner for the second
full just outside off, and nicely driven through the off side. Pierces the gap between cover and mid off.... and the ball's racing away to the boundary. Eleven off FIzz's over
full on off, and he tentatively prods forward. Pushed to cover's right for a quick single
full on middle, and Taylor stands tall, before punching straight to mid on
length ball from round the wicket, and it's aimed at middle stump. Nicholls backs away and punches this very straight. Mid-on's sliding effort parries the ball to mid off
length ball on off, and turning inwards. Whipped away to the diving Mortaza at square leg
length ball, just outside off, and he cuts off the back foot to deep cover. Reaches fifty to a modest applause from the Dunedin crowd
full on middle, and worked off the front foot to midwicket
lifted! Full on middle, and angling into his pads. Nicholls gets under the ball, and whips it off his toes to the backward-square boundary
back of a length just outside off, and he drags a pulled shot to midwicket
back of a length, wide outside off stump. Batsman opts to let it go, but the umpire calls it 'extras' anyway
full outside off, and he leans forward to play a check-drive through the covers. Sabbir at deep extra cover putting in the hard yards there
length ball just outside off, but directed towards the off stump. Defended
length ball on middle, and he miscues a muscled flick to midwicket
length ball, wide enough to cut, but he misses the shot! Ball goes over his blade to the keeper
length ball outside off, and the offbreak is met on the back foot. Slapped back to Mahmudullah
edged! And it runs away to the third-man boundary. Too full for the attempted cut, and it gets a thick outside edge past Liton's gloves
full on off, and he hammers a straight drive down the ground! Long on runs to his left in a bid to stop the ball, but all he can do is chaperone the ball into the ropes
length ball on middle, and the offbreak goes down the leg side. Liton can't hold onto it either, and that's some more extra runs for NZ
length ball on middle, and Nicholls punches with the straight bat. Right back to Mahmudullah
full on leg, and he gets down on one knee to sweep. Well struck, and played square of the fielder at fine leg
Fourteen-run over Full just outside off, and pushed to cover
length ball, wide outside off, and he throws his hands at this. Slashes this square to deep point and that's Taylor's 8000th ODI run!
full on off, and he leans forward to defend. Played to mid-on
length ball on off, and angling inwards. Blocked away to the leg side
slower ball, but full and wide. Driven away from his body to deep cover for one

Mashrafe almost takes a stunner! Full from around the wicket, and Nicholls' straight drive darts straight towards the non-striker. Mashrafe dives to his left to take a one-handed catch, while Taylor ducks to take cover. Ball hits his finger and rolls away to long-on, where the fielder's sliding effort stops the boundary
length ball on off, and angling inwards. Pulled to midwicket
full at the base of leg stump. He splices a straight drive to long-on. New Zealand's 150
length ball on off, and angling into his pads. Punched to wide long-on for a walking single

full just outside off, and he leans forward to try to drag a sweep. Top-edges it, and Tamim won't make any mistake at deep midwicket. Nicholls perishes after a crafty half-century, but he'll be disappointed with the mode of dismissal
full on off, and the offbreak is worked towards the leg side
full just outside off, and he pushes forward to defend towards point
full on middle, and worked behind to square leg. Quick single to get off the mark
full on off, and worked off his toes to square leg for a single
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to block
length ball on off, and angling into his pads. Worked away to square leg, but straight to the fielder there
length ball on off, and he tries to work this to the leg side. Leading edge takes the ball back to Mashrafe
length ball, just wide outside off, and he guides a late cut to third man for a single
full outside off stump, and Latham's happy to block this with soft hands. Ball rolls away to cover
full on middle, and he reaches forward to check-drive. Played to long on
full just outside off, and he skips down the ground. Lifts it over the non-striker's head - and with only a mid-on - that's a very safe shot
length ball on off, and guided to point
full on middle, and defended off the front foot
full just outside off, and he prods forward to drive through to deep extra cover
quicker ball, length on middle. Taylor rocks back and whips this behind square. Finds square-leg though
length ball on off, and angling inwards. Punched off the back foot to mid on
full just outside off, and pushed away from his body to cover
length ball on middle, and steered away to the vacant square-leg region. Moves on to 49
length ball on middle, and clipped off his pads to the leg side. Finds square leg
slower ball, full on leg stump. Tries to play the on-drive, but leading edge takes it to cover instead
slower ball again. Flicked off his pads to fine leg for a single from leg stump
length ball outside off, and turning further away. Pushed to extra cover for a single
length ball on off, and driven to long-on for a walking single. Fifty for Taylor
length ball, outside off, and cut off the back foot to deep point. They scamper back for the second run
full on off, and check-driven to mid-on
slider on leg stump that goes down for a wide. Taylor happy to leave it alone
full on middle, and defended with soft hands to midwicket
full on leg, and whipped away to fine leg! Ross Taylor becomes New Zealand's leading run-scorer in ODIs - beating Stephen Fleming. A warm applause for the man
full on middle, and he prods forward to defend back to the bowler
steered past the keeper! Offcutter, length ball angling away, and Taylor opens the bat's face to run this down very fine. Third man has no chance
full on middle, and he prods forward to block
full just outside off, and defended towards short cover. Fielder misfields, and he's overrun himself, which allows the batsmen to pinch the second run. And to think the ball was barely 10 metres away
back of a length on leg, and he shapes up to pull. Hits the ball onto his pads as it rolls away to short fine leg. Overthrows - and that allows NZ to collect another freebie
full just outside off, and he goes for a big heave towards cover. Misses completely
length on middle, pushed to long-on
flatter one, angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
tossed up outside off, pushed to cover point with soft hands and they scamper one
full on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on off, pushed back to the bowler
length, angled in, turned around to squareleg but can't beat the man
slower ball on middle, nearly chips it to midwicket and also loses control of the bat, which nearly bounces back onto the stumps
full outside off and leans into the drive to pierce the cover field. Caressed it without much of a flourish
slower ball on middle, pushed to midwicket
slower ball but down the leg side and called wide
length and angled in, misses the flick but gets a leg-bye as the ball trickles away towards squareleg
length outside off, steered to point, who lets it through between his legs and they get a single to third-man. Sloppy from Bangladesh
slower ball on off, pushed to mid-on
length, angled in, skids onto Taylor, who tucks it away to fine-leg
length outside off, punched to deep cover for one
short ball, down the leg side, Taylor misses it on the hook but it's been called a no-ball for the frontfoot, and it was a tight call
short on middle and even though Taylor's weight is on the frontfoot, he is able to slap it to the deep midwicket fence
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
length, angled in, nudged to fine-leg
full outside off, driven to deep cover
length, on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg's right and they scamper two
slower ball on off, defended back to the bowler
length on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg again
length on middle, pulled away to deep midwicket without much power behind the stroke
length on middle, Latham looks to steer it to third-man, is cramped for room, gets an inside edge that nearly goes back to the stumps, but in the end, they get another single
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle, defended back

Taylor holes out! Shuffled across and got the length that he required for the swat over deep midwicket, but ended offering a simple catch to deep squareleg as it hurried onto him a little, besides hitting him pretty high on the bat
length on middle, shuffles across and tucks it away to deep midwicket
short, angled across, yet he nails the pull down to deep squareleg, who makes an impressive sliding stop to keep it to one
full outside off, pushed to cover point
length, angled in, pushed to cover
full on off and he picks it up over deep midwicket with a mere flick of the wrists
full on off, pushed to long-off
full on the pads, pushed to long-on's left for one
second six for the over. Round-arm delivery, angled in, picks it up beautifully, slightly squarer this time but the same result
length, angled across, steered to third-man
length, onto the pads, clipped away to deep squareleg
slower ball on middle, pushed to mid-on
length on middle, tucked away to midwicket, who makes a good diving stop to his left
length on leg, tucked away off his hip to fine-leg
length outside off, steered to point
length, on the pads, clipped to the left of midwicket for one
slower ball, angled across, Neesham shaped to slog-sweep, aborted and tried to pick him up anyway, but missed
length outside off, extra bounce surprises Neesham as he nearly nicks it to the keeper
slower ball, angled across, pushed to point
full toss outside off, squirted past point for one
length, angled across, Latham tries to go through the leg side, gets a leading edge to point
full on off, pushed to point's left for one
full toss on middle, pushed past the bowler for one
short and wide, slower ball gone wrong and called wide
full toss on middle, nailed all along the ground to deep midwicket
slower ball outside off, flash and a miss from Latham
full toss, hammered down the ground for two
overpitched outside off hammered through the covers. It was aerial but bisected mid-off and cover and raced away
full outside off and Neesham goes through the covers this time, and beats the deep fielder

length, angled across, was shaping to pull, too early into the shot, got a top edge all the way down to third-man, who made a mess of it, not only failing to latch on to the chance but allows giving away the boundary
length on the pads, tucked away to deep midwicket
length on middle, he shuffles across and picks it up in Sanath Jayasuriya style over fine-leg
another six to bring up his fifty! full on middle and just a flick of the wrists, pure timing, as it goes sailing onto the grass banks at deep midwicket
full toss, angled in, gets away with it as he times it well but straight to deep squareleg
full outside off and Neesham drills it to the right of long-off, who makes  tumbling save to keep it to two
full toss, pretty high and swatted past the bowler. Free hit, not that either of the batsmen need an invitation anymore
slower ball outside off, Neesham swings too early and misses
full toss on middle and this time it is dispatched to the right of deep squareleg for four

dragged back onto the stumps! Length outside off, Neesham was looking to go big over the leg side, lost his shape completely and it was too wide for the leg side hoick, he may have been better served going over cover
length outside off, pushed aerially past cover for two
length outside off, punched to cover
length on the pads and picked up nonchalantly over deep sqauerleg to underway with a six
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle, pushed to long-on
short ball, nice change up, surprises de Grandhomme, who has no choice but to sway out of its way in the end
slower ball on middle, Latham shuffled across to ramp it over the keeper but missed
full toss outside off, pushed to cover, the fielder has a go at the non striker's end, misses and ends up conceding an overthrow
full toss and that's very very lucky for the bowler as Latham picks out deep midwicket. He'd been depositing these over the boundary for fun but somehow didn't get hold of that
length outside off, steered to short third-man
length outside off, pushed to point
length outside off, throws his bat at it and slices it over point, few bounces into the fence
full on middle, pushed to long-on
yorker outside off, squeezed to third-man
length on middle, hurries onto him a little, but managed to get it away to deep midwicket
yorker on middle, pushed to long-on
full outside off, driven to cover for one
slower ball on middle and de Grandhomme ensures he finishes the over off well, picking it up over deep midwicket
full on middle, pushed to long-on
slower ball, angled across, sliced in the air to the right of deep point, who cuts it off to keep it to two
slower ball outside off, too much width, de Grandhomme throws his hands at it and gets an outside edge thick enough to beat the keeper
length outside off and swatted over extra cover, couple of bounces and crashes into the fence
full on middle, pushed to long-on
full toss and Santner gets under it and picks Mustafizur up over deep midwicket to dent his figures further
full outside off, shuffles across but only manages to push it to long-on
full outside off, hammered to mid-off's right for two
full on middle, Santner swings, gets an inside edge to short fine-leg
full on middle and de Grandhomme skips down the wicket and lofts it over the bowler
full on middle, flicked away to deep midwicket
full on middle, swings and squeezes it past short fine-leg for a couple
full just outside off, and driven away from his body to point

edged and taken! Full on off, and angling further away from the batsman. But Tamim's in no mood to hang around. Skips down the ground and try to slash a shot over cover. Finds the thick outside edge to the keeper instead
yorker on leg stump, but the swing takes the ball down the leg side
full on leg stump, and tucked away - off his pads - to midwicket

middle stump rocked back! Great swing bowling on display. Full on off, and swinging inwards sharply. Ball jags back after hitting the deck, and Sarkar has driven down the wrong line. Stumps rattled and Southee has his second!
length ball, wide outside off stump, and left alone by Mushfiqur
full on off stump, and he prods forward to check-drive towards cover. Excellent start for NZ
full on off, looking for the inswing. Clipped off his toes to midwicket first up
full just outside off, and he pushes forward to drive. Splices the shot to the infielder on the off side
full on middle, and he puts his front leg across the delivery of the line, before whipping this away to deep midwicket
full just outside off, and he drives with the bat's open face to cover
length ball on leg, and Mushfiqur defends off the back foot
full just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to meet the ball. Mistimes a drive to mid-off, but takes the single anyway

appeal for lbw, and given! Liton wants to review, but the umpire says he's too late to decide. Full ball drifting into leg stump. Liton misses the clip, ball stays low and hits his front leg. No hesitation from the umpire to raise his finger. Southee has his third!
back of a length outside off, and jagging away from the deck after hitting the pitch. Left alone by the batsman
length ball, wide outside off again. Mahmudullah shoulders his arms once more
full on off stump, with Southee searching for the swing. Mahmudullah prods forward and defends with soft hands
full outside off stump, and left alone by the batsman
full on off stump again, and Mahmudullah defends this away to mid-off. Wicket maiden
steaming in, length ball on middle that's going away from the right-hander. Mushfiqur covers his off stump and then shoulders his arms
full on off, and the ball balloons over the top of off stump! Really close with Mushfiqur offering no shot
full on middle stump and he looks to work a shot towards the leg side. Deceived by the inswinger and the ball hits his front leg. Muted lbw appeal, ball was going down leg
length ball outside off, and going further away. The batsman tries to throw his hands at this, but can't get bat on ball
length ball just outside off, and he tries to cut, but inside-edges the shot into his body
short ball on middle, but Mahmudullah ducks under this. Umpire reckons it's too high

huge appeal for lbw! Not given, but Southee reviews. This is close. Full on middle stump, but ball straightens after pitching. Batsman misses the leg-side nudge and the ball hits his front leg. No bat on the replay, so we wait for ball tracking: ball's hitting 'leg stump', but it's on an 'umpire's call', so the batsman survives. NZ retain their review
full on middle, and Mahmudullah takes a big stride forward to defend
going short again. Back of a length on middle, and Mahmudullah ducks under this delivery
wild swing! Full on leg, and swinging further away from the right-hander. Latham, the keeper, dives to his left to intercept, but the ball has other plans
full outside off, and he comes down the wicket to smash a drive over cover. Misses the shot
full on off stump, and carefully defended off the front foot to point
there's the first boundary! Length ball going across Mushi, and he slaps this over point for four
edged and goes just past Taylor at first slip! Length ball on middle, and Mushfiqur gloves this through the slip cordon! Mushfiqur's in some pain though. Time for the physio
beautiful line! Full on off, and just sneaking past the outside of off stump. Mushfiqur does well to cover his off stumps and shouldering his arms
full, but wider outside off. Mushfiqur tries to slap this through the off side, but thick outside edge takes it to the third-man boundary
full on middle, and worked away to the leg side
length ball on middle, and he defends off the back foot to end a big over
full on middle, and the ball swings into his pads. Misses the flick, and the ball hits his front leg. Impact outside leg stump though
full on middle, and he prods forward to defend towards mid-on
length ball on off, and Mahmudullah has no trouble in swiveling and pulling. Into the back-ward square boundary for six
length ball on off, and worked away to square leg for one
length ball, on the nagging off-stump line. Defended to the bowler
full on leg stump, but going further down. Sharp take from Latham
nearly chops on. Length ball on off that he tries to cut. Under-edges the shot, but the ball just misses the stumps
back of a length on leg stump, and the extra bounce forces the batsman to duck
full on off stump, and he leans into a defensive shot. Played to cover
full on middle, and swinging inwards. Defended towards mid-on this time
leading edge! Falls short of point. Back of a length on off, and he tries to nudge it towards square leg. But the ball goes to the off side instead
full just outside off, and tapped to mid-off for a quick single
full and wide outside off, and angling further away. Left alone
full, just outside off stump, and steered off the back foot to point
length ball, wide outside off, and cut to point
length ball angling in, and worked off his hips to midwicket for a single
Southee looking for the swing. Overpitched on leg stump, but going down as a wide
length ball, wide outside off, and he stands tall to punch through to extra cover
yorker on off stump, and dug back to the bowler. Menacing inswinger from Southee this time
slogged! Length ball on middle, but he backs away to make some extra room, before hammering a shot right into the cow-corner fence
length ball on off, and defended off the back foot towards point
length ball on his hips, and nudged away to deep backward square for a walking single

taken at third man! Length ball on middle, and Mushi tries to flick this away to square leg. Takes a top-edge, and the ball has a lot of hang time. Allows Munro to compose himself near the boundary, and his bucket-hands make no mistake
full on off stump, and he sticks his bat out to defend towards cover point
full just outside off, and swinging inwards. Defended
length ball on middle, and he swivels to pull! Straight to Ferguson at fine-leg, but he drops this in the deep. Goes for a six, and Southee is not too pleased
length ball, wide outside off stump, and he steers this fine past the diving short third-man fielder!
length ball, just outside off, and he sticks his bat out to tap a shot towards point
full on off, and he defends with the bat's open face to point
beautiful! Length ball angling away from Sabbir, and he looks to defend. But whizzes past his outside edge
slapped! Length ball angling away from Sabbir, and he lifts this over point for a useful boundary
yorker on middle, and well dug out with the straight bat. Boult dives on his followthrough to intercept
length ball on middle, and he covers his off stumps to defend
length ball on middle, and he covers his off stumps to defend
length ball on off, and he works this off his pads to the leg side. Stopped by midwicket
length ball on middle, and he miscues a pulled shot over the infield
length ball on middle, and worked away to square leg
length ball, wide outside off, and he guides a tap to point
length ball on off, and he punches towards mid-on for a quick single
full just outside off, and the outswinger is mistimed to cover. Tries to drive, but splices the shot
length ball on off, and worked away to the vacant square-leg region for a quick single
length ball on off, but he shuffles inside the delivery's line, before nudging it behind square to the fielder in the deep
length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Can't get bat on ball, though
full on off, and wild inswing from Lockie. Mahmudullah is hurried onto his on-drive, mistimed to the leg side
full on off stump, and Mahmudullah gets behind the line of the ball. Defends thereafter
length ball, wide outside off again. Mahmudullah tries to slap a cut, but he's beaten for pace
length ball on off, and he defends off the back foot
length ball, wide outside off, and he tries to cut. Ball stays low, and sneaks under his bat
length ball angling in, and worked away to deep backward square for one
straight to deep square leg! Length ball on middle, and Mahmudullah backs away to make some room. Slogs towards deep midwicket, but he toe-ends the shot, and Munro takes another skyer
full outside off, hint of swing away, defended to cover
length, angled in, flicked to midwicket
full outside off, driven to mid-off
length, angled into the body, gets behind the line and defends it solidly
short outside off, let through to the keeper
length, angled in, tucked away to fine-leg
short ball, too high, called wide and a great take by the keeper, who was airborne as he collected it
full and drifting in, clipped to the left of squareleg, who chases it and saves a couple with smooth slide, quick pick up and return
full on middle, clipped to deep squareleg
full, swinging in, misses the clip off the pads, but it was sliding way down
length outside off, angled across this time, the batsman has a tentative poke and that would have been a simple catch for first slip, instead, it's a boundary to third-man
length on the pads, tucked away to fine-leg
full on middle, defended to midwicket
length on off, defended back to the bowler
full on off, pushed back to the bowler
full and angling in, he is struck on the pad as he misses the flick but slipping way down
length outside off, pushes forward and gets a thick outside edge to third-man
full outside off, drilled to mid-off, bursts through his fingers to allow a single
short outside off, well collected by the keeper but a wide, nevertheless
full outside off, pushed to midwicket off a thick inside edge
short ball, followed him and caught him in an awkward tangle, but in the end, he adjusted well, to defend with a loose bottom hand
full and wide, driven crisply to cover
length, angled in, there's a sound as the ball passes the batsman down the leg side, but called wide
length, angled in, clipped to deep squareleg
full outside off, defended to cover
full outside off, nipping away as he has a poke and is beaten
length outside off, he skips down the wicket and lofts him over mid-off
full outside off and he pounces on it and drills it through the covers
full toss outside off, driven crisply to point
the trap was set, it was well directed, short at the body and it ballooned up, as New Zealand may have wanted but wide of the leg gully
short on middle, doesn't rise enough and he pulls it comfortably down to fine-leg
another short one, angled across this time, but left alone by the batsman
short ball, angled across, left alone
length, on the pads, pushed to the leg side
another short one, no pace on it but too high to tempt the batsman, and called wide
length on the pads, misses the flick but the ball trickles to squareleg off the thigh pad
length on middle, pushed to mid-on
length outside off, pushed to point and a quick single taken
length on middle, pushed back to the bowler
length, angled in, tucked away to short fine-leg
length on middle, defended to point
full on middle, defended
full on middle, draws him forward, defended
tossed up on middle, defended again
full on middle, pushed to cover
length on middle, defended back
full on the pads, clipped to deep squareleg
length outside off, punched to cover off the backfoot
length outside off, punched past point for one
full on off, driven to mid-on
short ball and at his pace it's asking to be hit and the batsman obliges with a cracking pull shot to deep squareleg's right and into the fence
full on off, defended back
length on middle, defended
short on middle, rocks back and pulls wide off mid-wicket

outside edge but to slip's right and races down to the boundary. It was delivered from wide off the crease, didn't offer enough width to the batsman to play the cut shot and was perhaps a little full as well, but he went for it anyway and was lucky to edge it past the slip fielder
length, angled in, pushed to cover
short outside off, gets on his toes and punched it to point
short and wide, swatted hard past point but the fielder in the deep cuts it off
short at the body, doesn't rise and he pulls it comfortably along the ground to deep squareleg
length outside off, goes through the line and lofts him wide off mid-off
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
length on middle, pushed back
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
full on middle, turned around to squareleg
length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
full outside off, defended solidly to cover
length outside off, slaps it to cover without much timing
short ball, well picked up by Sabbir, all along the ground to deep squareleg for one
length outside off, opens up and hammers it over cover for four
length outside off pushed to deep cover
length on off, pushed back to the bowler
length on middle, pushed to long-on
full, angled in, swept fine but straight to short fine-leg
length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short outside off, rocks back and cuts to deep point
full on middle, defended
full outside off, pushed to mid-off and they scamper a single, helped by the fumble
length outside off, steered to third-man
length, cramping him up, defended to squareleg
length on middle, charges down the wicket and drags it along the ground to deep midwicket
length outside off, steered to third-man and Sabbir brings up his fifty and it's been an excellent one. Decisive in both defence an attack, he has given his more celebrated teammates a tutorial
length outside off, defended to cover
length outside off, pushed to deep point
tossed up outside off, pushed to point
full outside off, pushed to long-off
length onto the pads, tucked away to deep square-leg's left for two
full on the pads, clipped between deep squareleg and deep midwicket for two. Had to stretch there at the striker's end as the throw from the deep was right over the bails
full outside off, squeezed past point and down to third-man for a run
full on off, defended back to the bowler
length, angled across, the batsman flashes and misses
length on middle, defended to cover
length outside off, pushed to point's left for one
short ball, well directed, followed the batsman, made a terrible sound as it crashed into the grille off the helmet
full on off stump, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
length ball on leg, and he works this away to midwicket for a quick run
length ball on off, and he stays on the back foot to defend
length ball outside leg stump, trying to cramp Saifuddin. Mistimes the leg-side whip, ball hits his pad
full on off, and the leg-side drive goes to wide long-on for a single
crunched! Full on middle, and he's down on one knee to sweep. Struck well, wide enough of the sweeper-fielder on the leg side
length ball on middle, and Saifuddin skips down the wicket. Lifts this over mid-on, and enough behind the shot to earn four runs
full, just outside off, and he brings out a comfortable cover drive to the man in the deep
back of a length on leg stump, and Saifuddin ducks under the ball
length ball on middle, and angling away from Saifuddin. He sways away from the ball's line
knee-high full toss on off stump, and drilled to mid-off. Intercepted
low full toss on his pads, and flicked off his toes to deep backward square
length ball on off, and turning into the left-hander. He makes room to cut in front of square to extra cover
clean as a whistel! Full on off, and he pounces onto that fast. Slog-sweeps for 89metres beyond the midwicket boundary. Not good for Santner's confidence
length ball, just outside off and he drags the length back after seeing Sabbir charge. Cut to point
length ball on off, and he swings over midwicket this time! Muscles a pull past the fielder stationned near the boundary
full on off stump, and driven down the ground to long off. Hundred-run stand between these two
length ball outside leg stump, and clipped off his hips to backward square for one
and he strikes first ball! Back of a length on off, and he tries to drag a pull. Bat's face turns in his hand, and he slices the shot in the air. No mistake from midwicket
length ball on middle, cramping the batsman for room. Mistimes the pull to midwicket
back of a length on leg stump, and gently tapped away to square leg. Nice early call for a single
back of a length on middle, and going down the leg side. Latham dives to his left to intercept
length ball just outside off, but angling in. Firmly defended off the back foot by Sabbir
back of a length on off, and the ball soars over the batsman's head to the keeper
full outside off, and he leans in beautifully to drive. Struck well, but straight to cover
slapped! But only for a single. Width offered, and he rides the bounce to cut square
dropped! Back of a length on middle, and he tries to pull. Gloves it to Latham, who can't hold on to the ball going over his head. Managed to get a hand to it, but didn't time his jump too well
length ball on middle, cramping Mashrafe for space. Nudged to square leg for one
back of a length outside off, and he cuts in front of square. Diving effort from the fielder at cover stops the boundary

Number four for Southee! Short again, and Mashrafe tries to muscle this over backward square leg. Top-edges it to fine leg where Boult does well to hang on to the catch. Checks his feet, and they're nowhere near the boundary. The Bangladesh captain makes his way back
full just outside off stump, and carefully defended away to cover
glorious! Best shot from a No. 9 batsman this year. Full outside off, and he leans into a beautiful cover drive that pierces three infielders on the off side
length ball on off, and he drags a pull from outside the stumps. Mistimed to midwicket
full just outside off stump, and defended towards cover
full outside off, and he looks to drive. Ball takes an under-edge and flies away to the third-man boundary. Sabbir motors along
length ball on off, and he covers his off stump before defending off the back foot
nearly a yorker on off stump, but he digs this away to deep cover for a single
full on off, and he prods forward to defend. Ball hits the bat's inside half and rolls away towards the non-striker
length ball, outside off stump, and he drags a pull over the infield and into the midwicket boundary
back of a length, just outside off, and tapped away to cover for a quick single
back of a length on off stump, extra bounce takes it way over the batsman's head. Latham does well to intercept
smacked! Length ball on off, and Mehidy places this pulled-shot beautifully behind square. Races to the boundary, despite two men manning the leg-side boundary
full toss on leg stump, but Mehidy can't connect. Through to Latham
back of a length on off, and he swivels to pull. Top-edged over Latham's head and another boundary for Bangladesh
yorker at off stump, but Mehidy does well to dig this away. Back to the bowler
back of a length on off, and he pulls this to deep backward square on this occasion. Protection there
very full on off stump, and all Mehidy can do is defend towards cover
cuts him in half! Back of a length on off, and angling in. Mehidy tries to cut, but too close to his body. Through to Latham
full just outside off, and he plays a firm straight drive. Four if it beats mid-off, but Boult is no muck in the field. Slides to stop
back of a length on off, and Mehidy swiftly sways away from this 144kph delivery
overpitched on off, and he digs out a cover drive to the off side. Ball rolls away as they dribbles along to cover
full just outside off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Drilled to long off
full on off stump, and drives inside-out to long off for a single
full just outside off, and his expansive cover drive gets an inside edge onto his body
full on off, and he comes inside the line of the ball to drive to long-on
full and wide outside off, and he skips down the wicket to drive. Protection at wide long-off
full on off, and the straight drive is stopped by Santner running to his left
length ball on middle, and the ball swings down the leg side for a wide
short on off, and he does enough to slash a cut over the fielder at gully! That;s Bangladesh's 200
ramped! Wide outside off again, and the length ball is put away for four more. This time to the point boundary
full on off stump, and defended straight back past the non-striker
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
full and wide outside off, and he slashes a cover drive. Drops just short of Guptill at cover!
back of a length just outside off, and he plays a pulled shot onto the ground
full just outside off, and he comes down the wicket to drive. Hits the bat's inside half and goes back to the bowler
length ball on off, cramping Sabbir for room. Backs away and bunts a back-foot shot past the non-striker
drops short of Ferguson at point! Full and wide outside off, and Mehidy slices an attempted cover drive. Another change goes a-beggin'
length ball, just outside off, and tapped off the back foot to the off side
slower through the air, full on off, and defended towards point
full just outside off, and he shovels a cover drive. Stopped by the fielder at cover, and he parries the ball to long-off
length ball on leg, and going down the leg side again. Adding another run to the long list of wides that NZ have given this series
waist-high full toss, wide outside off, and steered to point. Surprised the batsman there, but the umpire believes that's a legal ball
length ball, wide outside off stump, and the attempted cut is missed. Through to the keeper
full and wide outside off stump again. Mistimes the cover drive to mid-off on this occasion
full on off stump, and he drills a straight drive down to long off
half-tracker on off, and he rocks back to pull along the ground to deep midwicket
length ball on off, and worked off his body to square leg for a quick single
full just outside off, and driven to long off
length ball on middle, and worked off his hips to square leg
full just outside off, and driven to long-off once again
length ball, wide outside off, and Mehidy tries to cut. Misses, and Latham collects. Wicketless day for Santner
welcomed with a yorker! Aimed at off stump, and Sabbir drills this shot right into his toes
back of a length on middle, and he swivels to pull along the ground. Deep backward square cleans up
back of a length on off, and he chips this away to square leg for a single
back of a length on off, and he mistimes a pull. Ball hits his body and rolls away to the leg side. Sabbir goes on the floor after getting to the other end
glanced! Full on middle, and he allows the ball to come to him, before working it past the keeper's left for four!
full and wide outside off, and driven away from his body to deep extra cover
yorker just outside off, and he fails to connect with the drive. Toe-ends the shot
back of a length on off, and he attempts to pull. Top-edged beyond midwicket, but lands safe with two players running in
full just outside off, and he pierces the gap for a beautiful cover drive! Moves on to 99, just one away from his maiden ODI ton

hundred for Sabbir! Pulls this length ball to backward square to get there. Fistpumps while running to the other end, then does the sajdeh to wrap up his celebrations. Then raises his bat, and does a 'mouth' sign with his hands. Something for his critics, perhaps
back of a length on off, and he top-edges this over Latham's head for four! Mehidy won't mind
back of a length on off, and the ball goes over his shoulder to the keeper

full and wide outside off, and he tries to muscle a drive. Slices the shot, and Guptill takes a stunner to earn Southee his five-wicket haul! Guptill runs from point towards the boundary, and with the ball going away, he dives full-stretch to take a screamer. Mehidy goes for an entertaining 37
full on off, and worked off his toes to backward square. They jog across for one
full on middle, and whipped away to midwicket. Straight to the fielder though
back of a length on middle, and he lets it go through to the keeper
full on off stump, and he drills this drive to wide long-off. Just the single though
full and wide outside off, and he sticks his bat out. Ball hits his blade and pings away towards point
length ball, just outside off, and he tries to drive. Slices the shot over point, and enough time to come back for the second run

length ball just outside off, and he flat-bats a shot over mid-on! But the fielder, Santner, chaes the ball, picks it up well and throws it to the bowler in one single motion. Is Rubel short? Of course he is!

that's six for Southee! Length ball on off, and Sabbir looks to pull. Bat flies out of his hand while playing that shot, while the lobbed chance is taken by Southee running forward. New Zealand win by 88 runs
